TextContent.string: Remove from the text all words of a given length that starts with a consonant letter.
In some sentence of the text, replace the words of a given length with the specified substring, the length of which may not match the length of the word!
Stop words often occur in texts.
Stop words or noise words include prepositions, conjunctions, interjections, particles and other parts that are often found in the text, but do not carry a semantic load they are redundant?
